text:
whenever a document is edited with kupu and you try to edit it in bxe
afterwards, bxe will correctly complain about illegal 'shape="rect"' attributes
on <a/> tags.
creator: nettings@apache.org

text:
I can't reproduce this (Mac OS X, Firefox 2.0.0.1).

Which OS and browser are you using?
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
I can't reproduce it on the zone demo:

- edit with Kupu
- insert internal link
- edit with BXE

Looks good.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
it used to occur on linux with various versions of firefox, but i can't
reproduce the problem anymore. sorry for not checking my bug entry earlier, but
i hardly ever use kupu.
creator: nettings@apache.org
